hcc_text: Croes Avenue is in the middle third in the Bronx for pedestrian deaths and serious injuries per mile.
info: At Croes Avenue at Cross Bx Exwy Nb En Harrod Avenue and Cross Bx Service Road South, there were 30 injuries in crashes between 2008 and 2012.
intersection: Croes Avenue at Cross Bx Exwy Nb En Harrod Avenue and Cross Bx Service Road South
